Michigan Initial Health & Safety Training Module B
Section 1: Child Development

Developmental Disabilities

Group of Conditions Due to an Impairment

Developmental disabilities are a group of conditions due to an impairment in physical, learning, language, or behavioral area.

May Impact Day-to-Day Functioning & Can Last a Lifetime

These conditions may mpact day-to-day functioning. They may last a lifetime.

1 in 6 children have 1 or more developmental disability

One out of six children in the US have one or more developmental disabilities.

Most Begin Before a Baby is Born

Most developmental disabilities begin before a baby is born, but some can happen after birth because of injury, infection, or other factors.
